Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-35255 affecting package blobfuse2 for versions less than 2.3.2-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-35255 affecting package blobfuse2 for versions less than 2.3.2-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package blobfuse2 is earlier than 2.3.2-1, affected by CVE-2024-35255
